thread.title: Kotoko GM Opoku Nti claims uncertainty about future affecting recruitment plans
thread.title_full: Kotoko GM Opoku Nti claims uncertainty about future affecting recruitment plans

title: Kotoko GM Opoku Nti claims uncertainty about future affecting recruitment plans
text:
19:40 CET Kotoko GM Opoku Nti claims uncertainty about future affecting recruitment plans - www.ghanasoccernet.com Opoku Nti 
Asante Kotoko General Manager Opoku Nti has revealed the club's transfer dealings is being frustrated by reports of his imminent exit. 
The current board and management according to reports will soon be replaced by club owner Otumfuo Osei Tutu II. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us I do not preach money but rather life,and i will never preach money but rather life. By: Kyei-Afrifa Ma Germ
